result.reason_for_recall: Cass-Clay Creamery is voluntarily recalling a number of ice cream products because they may contain undeclared soy (lecithin).
result.recalling_firm: Cass Clay Creamery AMPI Fargo Division
result.code_info: all products that has a plant code of "38-25".
result.initial_firm_notification: Two or more of the following: Email, Fax, Letter, Press Release, Telephone, Visit
